txt.en: Burning spider corpses would force the giant bats to waste time hunting
You have burned all the spider corpses at Dalugronk, depriving the bats of their food.
Burning the spider corpses at Dalugronk would mean less food for the bats, and more time dedicated to hunting again.
You have burned all the spider corpses at Dalugronk, depriving the bats of their food. The Orcs will be hard-pressed to command their hungry bats in battle.
Burning the spider corpses at Dalugronk would mean less food for the bats, and more time dedicated to hunting again.

The giant bats at Dalugronk hunt and feed on spiders, leaving half-eaten spider corpses throughout the area for future meals. Burning these corpses would mean less food for the bats, and more time dedicated to hunting again.
The giant bats at Dalugronk hunt and feed on spiders, leaving half-eaten spider corpses throughout the area for future meals.
